content: INSIGHTS - Creating tomorrow with Continuing Education | Temasek Polytechnic INSIGHTS - Creating Tomorrow with Continuing Education SHARE DIGITAL FILM & TELEVISION | SCHOOL OF DESIGN | TEMASEK POLYTECHNICS https://www.tp.edu.sg/ Welcome to INSIGHTS! Hear our industry professionals and education specialists' thoughts and perspectives on the latest trends, evolving landscapes, and best continuing education strategies to help you become the forerunner of your industry. "Singapore's sterling image for safety demands a proactive and multifaceted approach. By integrating technology, fostering collaboration, and developing a skilled workforce, we can build a resilient security ecosystem able to withstand emerging threats." Mr Faizal Zainal Head, Security Industry Institute Temasek Polytechnic READ MORE Graduation 2024 at Temasek Polytechnic celebrates the remarkable achievements of our students, with a special spotlight on the success stories of our adult learners. These individuals have demonstrated extraordinary commitment and resilience, balancing professional and personal responsibilities while pursuing their education. We are proud to honour their journey and success, showcasing the transformative power of lifelong learning. CONGRATS to all our adult learners! READ MORE "Embrace innovation, empower leaders, and shape a sustainable future with us at Temasek Polytechnic." Mr Wallace Lim Senior Director, Chief Sustainability Officer Temasek Polytechnic READ MORE Discover the stories of women who have embraced continuous learning and upskilling, inspiring others to follow suit. If they can do it, so can you. Empowered women empower the world. Happy International Women's Day! READ MORE "Empowerment through learning isn't just about knowledge; it's crafting adaptable pathways for continuous improvement. Lifelong learning is not a just goal; it's a commitment to growth and success." Dr Kwan Kian Hoong Director Temasek SkillsFuture Academy Temasek Polytechnic READ MORE Contact Details Enquire Now Mainline 67881212 Monday - Thursday: 8:30am - 6:00pm Friday: 8:30am - 5:30pm Closed during lunchtime, 12:00pm - 1:00pm and on weekends and public holidays. https://www.tp.edu.sg/tsa Temasek SkillsFuture Academy (TSA) Temasek Polytechnic East Wing, Block 1A, Level 3, Unit 109 21 Tampines Ave 1 Singapore 529757 We use cookies to offer you a better browsing experience.
